articles.title: 'You Indians don't follow the rules': Man allegedly insists woman's baby wear a mask at Bedok Reservoir - AsiaOne

articles.title: Caroline Kennedy in running to be named US ambassador to Australia: report - The Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: While no official announcements have been made, AP separately reported that Kennedy is expected to serve in a high-profile ambassadorial role in the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: Pooja Rani wins her 2nd Asian Boxing Championships gold after beating Mavluda Movlonova in 75kg final - India Today
articles.description: Pooja Rani beat her opponent from Uzbekistan by unanimous 5-0 decision to secure the first gold medal for India in this edition of the Asian Elite Boxing Championships in Dubai.
articles.content:
Indian pugilist Pooja Rani repeated her gold-medal winning performance at the Asian Elite Boxing Championships on Sunday as she beat Mavluda Movlonova in the women's 75kg final in Dubai.
